# Gies College of Business Website - Structured Site Map

> This site map organizes the Gies College of Business website content into key areas: Academics, Research & Faculty, Student Experience, About Gies, News & Events, and Support & Partnerships.

> Information about the college, its leadership, facilities, and key facts.

## Topic Index

* **Admissions:** Undergraduate, Graduate
* **Alumni:** Networking, Events
* **Career Services:** Professional Development,  Gies Professional Pathway
* **Corporate Partnerships:** Invest, Recruit, Develop Workforce
* **Degrees:** MBA, MSA, MSBA, MSF, MSM, MSTM, PhD
* **Events:** Business Development, Academic Calendar
* **Experiential Learning:**  Illinois Business Consulting,  Projects
* **Faculty:** Profiles, Research, Directory
* **Facilities:**  Wymer Hall ([https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/wymerhall](https://giesbusiness.illinois.edu/wymerhall)),  Campus Visits
* **Financial Aid:** Scholarships, Tuition
* **Giving:**  Donate, Ways to Give
* **Global Programs:** Study Abroad, International Opportunities
* **News:**  Articles, Announcements
* **Research:** Centers & Initiatives, Articles, Publications
* **Student Life:** Organizations, Academies,  Support Services
